SongName: I Took A Pill In Ibiza

[00:00.44]I took a pill in Ibiza
[00:03.16]To show Avicii I was cool
[00:05.59]And when I finally got sober, felt 10 years older
[00:07.82]But fuck it, it was something to do
[00:09.78]I'm living out in LA
[00:12.41]I drive a sports car just to prove
[00:14.49]I'm a real big baller cause I made a million dollars
[00:16.97]And I spend it on girls and shoes
[00:18.73]But you don't wanna be high like me
[00:20.76]Never really knowing why like me
[00:23.23]You don't ever wanna step off that roller coaster
[00:25.77]And be all alone
[00:27.79]You don't wanna ride the bus like this
[00:29.93]Never knowing who to trust like this
[00:32.21]You don't wanna be stuck up on that stage singing
[00:34.73]Stuck up on that stage singing
[00:37.32]All I know are sad songs, sad songs
[00:46.35]Darling, all I know are sad songs, sad songs
[00:54.39]
[01:14.19]I'm just a singer who already blew his shot

[01:22.34]And I can't keep a girl, no
[01:25.02]Cause as soon as the sun comes up
[01:27.46]I cut 'em all loose and work's my excuse
[01:30.09]But the truth is I can't open up

[01:34.44]Never really knowing why like me
